QuestData.Title: Mage-Lieutenant Malister
QuestData.Description: THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS! Those proto-drakes are attacking the keep!$B$BBeasts such as that should have been scared off when you took care of their clutches and whelps.$B$BYou did take care of them, right?$B$B$n, this calls for more direct action. Speak with my advisor, Mage-Lieutenant Malister. He'll provide you with the means to get at those infernal creatures.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Adams has asked you to speak with his advisor, Mage-Lieutenant Malister, at Westguard Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: <Malister beckons you closer and speaks in whispered tones.>$B$BI was worried that something like this might happen. I tried to dissuade the captain from this course of action, but he is a dwarf of action with a definite outlook on how things should proceed.$B$BLet us speak of the options left to us.
